text: Hey guys, does anyone know if it's possible to install tailwind css to a HubSpot project?  if so, how?  thanks in advance

Hi there, new here, so hoping someone might be able to point me in the right direction. Having an issue with an embedded Iframe on our site. The cookies policy is appearing within the iframe every time the page is refreshed. Iframe is a Typeform survey.
The HubSpot cookie policy is appearing inside the iframe?
Supposedly something to do with Google SameSite
Cookies can't be shared across domains. The cookie is being set in the iframe which is a different domain than the one you are viewing.
You'd have to hide it in the iframe, and then set a new cookie policy on the actual page.

Is it no longer possible to add a module in the global html head or into a global partial and have it be editable on every page (without it being global content)? I swear I used to be able to do this.
if its in the global context i doubt it
I've definitely done it in the past, but it seems like it always treats it as global content now, even if it's not a global module :disappointed:
Sorry totes forgot to tag, <@U25C65C3S>*,* thank you for anything you can think of, hope you are having a stellar Friday and have an even more wonderful weekend ahead!
